name: The Chronic
description: A hop forward IPA.  Citra, Strata, and Columbus hops provide tasting notes of sticky pine resin, dank grapefruit, and aromatic lime zest.  Come get a hit of The Chronic.

name: Cherry Pineapple Sour
description: Sweet pineapple meets tart cherry in a puckering, fruit-forward delight.

name: Midnight Reserve
description: Deep Roast, Rich brown sugar, Silky Smooth

name: Chocolate Cherry Porter
description: Our Valentine's Day gift from us to you. Why? Because we love you.  This is our original porter with additions of chocolate fudge and sweet dark cherry.

name: Paved In Gold
description: A focus on quality and tropical ingredients have the runway to your tastebuds ‘Paved in Gold.’  A big hop driven IPA, approachable and dangerous with El Dorado, Rakau, Amarillo hops.

name: Dorado Loco
description: Translation: "Crazy Gold".  This Mexican Lager was brewed with maximum thirst quenching ability and built to satisfy your taste buds.  Try it with a lime!

name: American Lager
description: In pursuit of the maximizing drinkability, we created a crispy clean American Lager, a beer style that is rooted deeply in Wisconsin culture.  We pair traditional noble hops with new school Indie Hops, resulting in a delightfully approachable beer with a tangy fresh flavor that is squeaky clean.

name: Goat Talk
description: Dark, smooth, and indulgent. This lager pours deep amber with flavors of caramelized malt, toasted bread, and subtle dark fruit. Full-bodied yet clean, it finishes warm and satisfying.

name: Watermelon Premium Seltzer
description: A simple syrup based hard premium seltzer, Watermelon flavored, and full of bubbles.  Gluten free, Lactose Free

name: Strawberries & Cream Sour
description: Lightly tart fruited sour infused with strawberry puree, cream and vanilla flavoring.  Gluten Free, Lactose Free.

name: Penny Slot Dunkel
description: Drinking this dark German lager is just like playing the odds on penny slots.  So satisfying that it keeps coming back again and again....and again.

name: Lock & Key Porter
description: A combination of dark caramel and brown coffee malts capture the sweet, rich, and slightly bitter flavors that both caramel and your favorite iced latte exhibit

name: Hef Time
description: Hefeweizen brewed for the autumn season and football games.  A sweet front of banana with a spicy clove finish.
